title: Very short development times
content: I do not trust in any other tool to do 2D fast development considering that the UI has to be retina enabled, responsive and with transitions and animations to be programmed in very short development times.
author: Luis Guajardo Diaz

title: Runs very smoothly on all platforms
content: I started a professional tablet application based on Feathers, and this library saves me a lot of time and pain in the development process. The app runs very smoothly on all platforms, including Android tablets, iPad, and Windows tablets. That's simply awesome.
author: Elefantz, Feathers UI forum member

title: Game-changer!
content: Feathers UI is a game-changer when it comes to creating beautiful, high-performance user interfaces quickly and efficiently. One of the standout features is the ability to skin and fully customize all the UI components to align perfectly with the look-and-feel of our product. From buttons to sliders to entire menus, every UI element can be tailored exactly how I want, making it easy to achieve a consistent and polished design. It really helps give our app its unique identity.
author: Steve Easley, VIP Interactive

title: Absolute joy to develop with
content: We have a pretty significant app completely built with Feathers. Very happy with the results, and early feedback has been amazing. Absolute joy to develop with it. Thank you so much.
author: Darren Yuhar, Software Developer at Profilze

title: For an enterprise of 20,000+ employees
content: I've built cross-platform mobile apps in Feathers for an enterprise of 20,000+ employees. Engineers, scientists all over the world are using it to great advantage and are extremely happy with it. The UI is snappy & appealing, native extensions provide access to os/hardware features, and the application itself is easily customizable. Thank you for all your great work!
author: Thomas Wooldridge, Software Developer

title: I've used Feathers daily, for several years.
content: Just want to thank Feathers for the most amazing UI components. I've used them daily, for several years.
author: Mike Gowan

title: My client was really impressed
content: I really like how both Starling and Feathers have proven to be great platforms for non-gaming applications. From the beginning, I felt that if you can do games, you can do anything! My client was really impressed with the multi-platform performance of AIR / Starling / Feathers, so it wasn't hard to convince them to use these libraries. Thanks, Daniel and Josh. This app wouldn't have been possible without your awesome frameworks and support!
author: Olaf Wempe, owner at 0l4f.com

title: The design is right for smooth UI
content: The design is right for smooth UI, running hardware accelerated.
author: Thibault Imbert, Adobe Systems

title: Engineers and scientists using it
content: We've got engineers and scientists using it all over the world to help our clients!
author: Mike Cizenski
